channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After a Heartbreaking Injury in the NBA Finals, Tyrese Haliburton Desperately Wanted to Do 1 Thing. It’s a Lesson in Emotional Intelligence
item.description: With his touching gesture, Haliburton did what all great leaders do: He put the needs of his team ahead of his own.

item.title: The IPO market is booming—and more big listings like Klarna and StubHub could come this fall
item.description: More companies have gone public this year than any time since 2021.

item.title: 5 Ways to Hire Inclusively in a Post-DEI World
item.description: Company polices may have changed, but the benefits of a diverse workforce remain well documented. Here’s how to help create one.

item.title: DeFi company Blueprint Finance raises $9.5 million from Polychain Capital
item.description: The company will spend the money raised in this round on hiring, engineering and marketing.

item.title: FICO’s new credit scores will include buy now, pay later loans data. Here’s how it could impact your score
item.description: Buy now, pay later (BNPL) payment options are increasingly popular, particularly among young consumers. A recent survey from J.D. Power shows that 42%...

item.title: Kroger is closing 60 stores: See the list of locations that are reportedly shuttering in 2025 so far
item.description: Kroger is joining the list of retailers that plan to scale back on brick-and-mortar locations this year. The grocery giant said in its first-quarter e...

item.title: This Waffle House Video Parody Nails 4 Keys to Great Employee Training. Here’s Why
item.description: Fake training videos for the chain are all over social media, but this one got some effective principles for training just right.

item.title: Melinda French Gates says some tech titans siding with Trump are doing ‘what some comms person’ tells them instead of living by their values

item.title: How oil prices are faring after U.S. strikes on Iranian nuclear sites
item.description: Global markets appeared to take the U.S. strike against nuclear targets in Iran in stride as investors watched Monday to see how Iran will react. The ...

item.title: How This Upstart Brand Made $70,000 in Sales Before Even Launching
item.description: ERLY founders Jamie Chandlee and Hallie McDonald are leaning into the event strategy that made them five figures pre-launch.

item.title: Tesla robotaxi finally launches but hiccups include long wait times, Pokemon-style hunts for the car and even driving in wrong lane
item.description: While Tesla attempted to minimize risks in part by inviting out-of-town influencers from the Tesla community, there were some issues.

item.title: Charlie Munger’s Secret to Success Had Nothing to Do With Picking Stocks
item.description: Munger believed the best investors read widely and thought like philosophers.

item.title: The Google exec who oversaw $66.9 billion in ad revenue so far this year says AI is ‘changing the game on what is possible’
item.description: Vidhya Srinivasan led Amazon Web Services' first cloud data centers launches before taking on a pivotal transformation at Google.
